issue.title: [Website] Fix blog post author header
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6066](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6066). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While working on the R package post, I noticed some oddities with how the author metadata is handled. Links and names are wrong if the author isn't registered in _data/contributors.yml, and the permalink version of the post works differently from the main feed.
